item.content:encoded:
Recommended To Me

  • https://www.amazon.com/Wanting-Power-Mimetic-Desire-Everyday/dp/1250262488?geniuslink=true
  • https://www.amazon.com/Myth-Revisited-Small-Businesses-About-ebook/dp/B000RO9VJK/ref=sr_1_1?crid=CDWUBP1C6XLD&keywords=the+e+myth&qid=1655692409&sprefix=the+e+myth%2Caps%2C61&sr=8-1

  • The Paper Menagerie

Want To Read

  • Expert Secrets https://www.amazon.com/dp/1401970605?th=1&keywords=expert%20secrets%20russell%20brunson&geniuslink=true
  • The Coaching Habit
  • Badass: Making Users Awesome
  • The Little Black Book of Design — https://www.amazon.com/Little-Black-Book-Design-ebook/dp/B0030BFX12/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?qid=&sr=
  • Continuous Discovery Habits https://www.amazon.com/Continuous-Discovery-Habits-Discover-Products-ebook/dp/B094PVB97X?qid=&sr=
  • The Story Engine: An entrepreneur’s guide to content strategy and brand storytelling without spending all day writing https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0722TR5LX/ref=nodl_?tag=readwise-20&dplnkId=19f5fd0f-03a7-41fc-b146-4d115ca0769a
  • Seeing is Forgetting the Name of the Thing One Sees: https://www.amazon.com/Seeing-Forgetting-Name-Thing-Sees/dp/0520256093/ref=sr_1_3?crid=IDJ1OVRUZPQL&keywords=seeing+is+forgetting+irwin&qid=1671645420&sprefix=seeing+is+forgetting+irwin,aps,72&sr=8-3
  • Setting the Table https://smile.amazon.com/Setting-Table-Transforming-Hospitality-Business/dp/0060742763
  • Be Our Guest https://smile.amazon.com/Be-Our-Guest-Perfecting-Institute/dp/1423145844
  • Hallucinations https://amzn.to/3jhaa1A
  • The One Hour Content Plan — https://www.amazon.com/dp/B074T5ZHP7?tag=readwise-20
  • Don’t Make Me Think — Steve Krug
  • Drive — Daniel Pink
  • The Power of Regret — Daniel Pink
  • Lifespan — https://www.amazon.com/dp/0008353743?tag=aliabdaal-20&keywords=david%20sinclair&geniuslink=true
  • The Power of Now https://www.amazon.com/dp/0340733500?tag=aliabdaal-20&keywords=the%20power%20of%20now&geniuslink=true
  • Seneca: Letters from a Stoic
  • Ikigai
  • 12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos
  • Measure What Matters
  • A Scanner Darkly
  • Tools of Titans: The Tactics, Routines, and Habits of Billionaires, Icons, and World-Class Performers
  • The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People: Powerful Lessons in Personal Change
  • Zero to One: Notes on Startups, or How to Build the Future
  • Sprint: How to Solve Big Problems and Test New Ideas in Just Five Days
  • The Hard Thing About Hard Things: Building a Business When There Are No Easy Answers
  • Meditations
  • Start with Why
  • The Art and Business of Online Writing — https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08GZK274F?tag=aliabdaal-20&geniuslink=true
  • Inspired: How to Create Tech Products Customers Love
  • Build What Matters: Delivering Key Outcomes with Vision-Led Product Management
  • Breath from Salt
  • Leaders Eat Last
  • Four Agreements https://www.amazon.com/Four-Agreements-Practical-Personal-Freedom/dp/1878424319#customerReviews
  • Unconditional Parenting
  • Dune
  • It Doesn’t Have to Crazy At Work
  • Thinking in Bets

Up Next

  • This is Personal https://www.amazon.com/This-Personal-Delivering-Right-Email-ebook/dp/B0BSL3JLHD?crid=3V1Q72ZSZV6C4&keywords=this+is+personal&qid=1697987819&sprefix=this+is+personal,aps,73&sr=8-1
  • So You Want to Start a Podcast https://www.amazon.com/You-Want-Start-Podcast-Community-ebook/dp/B07KG9Y1CG?qid=&sr=
  • Wired for Story

Currently Reading

Paused/Put Down

  • Deep Work
  • Thinking Fast & Slow
  • The Checklist Manifesto
  • The Crime Without a Name
  • Sapiens

Put Down

  • The Design of Everyday Things

Read

  • Superfans
  • Range Why Generalists Triumph in a Specialized World
  • The Inner Game of Tennis
  • Four Thousand Weeks
  • Anything You Want
  • Keep Going
  • Principles
  • The Shape of Design
  • Make Time
  • Atomic Habits
  • Steal Like an Artist
  • The 4-Hour Workweek
  • Show Your Work!
  • Alchemy
  • How to Take Smart Notes
  • Made to Stick

Reviewed
